item.title: Accenture demonstrates a potential vision of the future of retail in the Asia Pacific region
item.description:
A recent report from Accenture, “The future is now: understanding the new Asian consumer,” highlights that consumer packaged goods (CPG) companies need to embrace digital commerce fully or face being overtaken by newer players in the rapidly growing Asia Pacific market. This market is expected to grow by US$340 billion by 2020, with China leading the way. Accenture emphasizes that CPG companies must adapt to a new generation of consumers who prefer digital engagement and trust social influence...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/accenture-demonstrates-a-potential-vision-of-the-future-of-retail-in-the-asia-pacific-region/
